content.question: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a horizontal tangent. Determine whether g has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

frqParts.text: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a horizontal tangent. Determine whether g has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
